B.B2: Total number of unkown or new records for AQ zone feature for the INSPIRE namespace
B.B2_SHORT: Number of unknown zones or new records of zones
B.B3: The number of zones designated with coordinates via the ./am:geometry element
B.B3_SHORT: Number of zones that provides coordinates inside the xml via geometry element
B.B4: The number of zones designated with coordinates via the ./aqd:LAU element and the ./aqd:shapefileLink element
B.B4_SHORT: Number of zones that provides coordinates via Local Administrative Units (LAU) element and external shapefile link
B.B7: List of unique combinations of aqd:aqdZoneType, aqd:pollutantCode and aqd:protectionTarget
B.B7_SHORT: Number of unique combinations of zone types, pollutants and protection target
B.B8: All gml:id attributes, am:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
B.B8_SHORT: Internal XML identifiers must be unique (gml:id, base:localId)
B.B9: ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code within namespace
B.B10: ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
B.B13: /aqd:AQD_Zone/am:name/gn:GeographicalName/gn:language value shall be the language of the name, given as a three letters code, in accordance with either ISO 639-3 or ISO 639-5.
B.B13_SHORT: The geographical language code must correspond to either the ISO 639-3 or ISO 639-5.
B.B18_SHORT: The geographical language text must be a string
B.B20: /am:geometry/gml:Polygon, ./am:geometry/gml:Point, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiPoint, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiSurface, ./am:geometry/gml:Grid, ./am:geometry/gml:RectifiedGrid the srsName attribute shall be a recognisable URN. The following 3 srsNames are expected ./am:geometry/gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to "2" to allow the x & y-coordinate of the feature of interest or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4258 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326
B.B20_SHORT: The coordinate reference system for the zones must be defined with a correct uniform resource name and must either be ETRS 1989, ETRS89/ETRS-LAEA or WGS 84
B.B21: ./am:geometry/gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to "2" to allow the x & y-coordinate of the feature of interest
B.B21_SHORT: The dimension attribute must be given the value "2"
B.B22: ./am:geometry /gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList the count attribute shall resolve to the sum of y & x;coordinate doublets.
B.B22_SHORT: The count attribute must be equal to the Y and X coordinate doublets
B.B23: Check that the coordinates lists in ./am:geometry /gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList ar presented in lat / long (y;axis / x;axis) notation.
B.B23_SHORT: The coordinates must be ordered as latitude (y-axis) ,longtitude (x-axis)
B.B25_SHORT: Start time must be less than end time
B.B26: ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition equal to indeterminatePosition="unknown"/ shall indicate the zone is operational.
B.B26_SHORT: If end time is 'unknown,' then the zone is active
B.B27: ./am:designationPeri/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition with valid content (historical content) shall indicate that the zone is no longer operational.
B.B27_SHORT: If end time is displayed, the zone is no longer active
B.B28: ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be a valid historical date for the start of the version of the zone in extended ISO format. If an am:endLifespanVersion exists its value shall be greater than the am:beginLifespanVersion
B.B28_SHORT: End date must be greater than start date, if end date exists
B.B29: ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be LESS THAN OR EQUAL TO ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition
B.B29_SHORT: Start date shall be less, or equal to
B.B30: ./am:environmentalDomain shall be a citation via href xlink attribute of http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/MediaValue/air (currently resolves to 404 error)
B.B35: ./aqd:zoneCode shall be a unique code for the zone within the ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace. ./aqd:zoneCode . The value may equal the value at ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId
B.B35_SHORT: Zone code must be unique. The value may e equal the LocalId
B.B36: ./aqd:residentPopulation shall be an integer value GREATER THAN 0 (zero)
B.B36_SHORT: Population must be a value higher than zero
B.B37: ./aqd:residentPopulationYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition shall cite the year in which the resident population was estimated in yyyy format
B.B37_SHORT: Year in which the resident population was estimated must have the format yyyy
B.B38: ./aqd:area the value will be a decimal number GREATER THAN 0 (zero)
B.B38_SHORT: The Area value must be a decimal number, greater than zero.
B.B40: /aqd:timeExtensionExemption attribute must resolve to one of concept within http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/
B.B40_SHORT: ExtensionExemption attribute must conform to Vocabulary http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/
B.B41: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/NO2 1h OR http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/NO2 annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Nitro gen dioxide Nitrogen dioxide (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B41_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is either NO2-1h, or NO2-annual, then NO2 and Protection Target Health must be present
B.B42: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/PM10-24h OR http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/PM10-annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Particulate matter < 10 μm (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B42_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is either PM10-24h, or PM10-annual, then PM10 and Protection Target Health must be present.
B.B43: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/C6H6-annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Benzene (air) + healt http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/20 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B43_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is C6H6-annual, then C6H6 and Protection Target Health must be present.
B.B45: ./am:geometry shall not be a href xlink. If geometry is provided via shapefile, please use element aqd:shapefileLink
B.B45_SHORT: Geometry should not be a hyperlink. If provided via shapefile, element aqd:shapefileLink need to be used
B.B46: Where ./aqd:shapefileLink has been used this should return a link to a valid and existing link in cdr (e.g. http://cdr.eionet.europa.eu/es/eu/aqd/b/envurng9g/ES_Zones_2014.shp)
B.B46_SHORT: Where a link is provided, it should refer to an existing and valid shape file in the same folder in the CDR as the XML is uploaded
B.B47:
./aqd:aqdZoneType attribute must resolve to one of concept within http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/[concept]
Currently, these are: http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/noagg or http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/agg
B.B47_SHORT: Zone type must be either Agglomeration or Non-agglomeration

D.D1: Total number of environmental monitoring feature types provided within this XML
D.D1_SHORT: Total number feature types within this XML Document:
D.D2: Compile and feedback upon the total number of new records for each environmental monitoring feature types included in the delivery
D.D2_SHORT: Total number of new records for each feature type included in the delivery:
D.D3: Compile and feedback upon the total number of modification to existing for each environmental monitoring feature types included in the delivery
D.D3_SHORT: Total number of modifications to existing feature types included in the delivery:
D.D4: Full list of reported Environmental Monitoring Feature within this XML
D.D4_SHORT: Reported Environmental Monitoring Features within this XML Document:
D.D5: All gml:id attributes, ef:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
D.D5_SHORT: Id elements must have unique content
D.D6: aqd:AQD_Network/ef:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code for AQD_network and unique within the namespace.
D.D6_SHORT: Must be a unique code for the AQD_network.
D.D7: Count the number of unique AQD_Network (via localId) submitted within base:namespace.
D.D7_SHORT: The number of unique Ids submitted:
D.D8: The content of aqd:AQD_Network/ef:mediaMonitored shall resolve to any concept inhttp://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/MediaValue/
D.D8_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised media value. These are: Air, Biota, Landscape, Sediment, Soil/Ground, Waste and Water.
D.D9: The content of aqd:AQD_Network/ef:organisationLevel shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/organisationallevel/
D.D9_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised Organisation Level. These are: International, Local, LocalAuthority, Municipality, National and Regional.
D.D10: The content of aqd:AQD_Network/aqd:networkType shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/networktype/
D.D10_SHORT: Must conform to the code 'air' in the Media codelist in the Inspire registry
D.D11_SHORT: Start time must be before End time.
D.D14: The content of /aqd:AQD_Network/aqd:aggregationTimeZone attribute shall resolve to a valid code in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timezone/
D.D14_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised Time Zone: These are UTC (+01 to +06) and (-01 to -06)
D.D15: aqd:AQD_Station/ef:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code within namespace
D.D15_SHORT: Station ID must be a unique code.
D.D16: Count the number of unique AQD_Station (via localId) submitted within base:namespace.
D.D16_SHORT: The number of unique Stations reported are:
D.D18: The content of /aqd:AQD_Station/ef:mediaMonitored shall resolve to any concept in http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/MediaValue/
D.D18_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised media value. These are: Air, Biota, Landscape, Sediment, Soil/Ground, Waste and Water.
D.D19: The content of /aqd:AQD_Station/ef:mediaMonitored shall resolve to any concept in http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/MediaValue/
D.D19_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised media value. These are: Air, Biota, Landscape, Sediment, Soil/Ground, Waste and Water.
D.D20: ./ef:geometry/gml:Points the srsName attribute shall be a recognisable URN . The following 2 srsNames are expected urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4258 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326
D.D20_SHORT: The coordinate reference system for the zones must be defined with a correct uniform resource name and must either be ETRS 1989, ETRS89/ETRS-LAEA or WGS 84
D.D21: ./ef:geometry/gml:Point/gml:pos the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to "2" to allow the coordinate of the station
D.D21_SHORT: The Dimension attribute shall resolve to "2."
D.D23: Total number aqd:AQD_Station invalid operational activity periods
D.D23_SHORT: Total number of invalid operational activity periods for the stations
D.D24: Total number of aqd:AQD_Station which are operational
D.D26: AQD_Station/aqd:EUStationCode shall be an unique code for the station starting with ISO2-country code
D.D26_SHORT: Station code must be unique, starting with ISO2-country code
D.D27: The content of aqd:AQD_Station/aqd:meteoParams shall resolve to any concept in http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P07/current/, http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/I01/current/, http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/meteoparameter/
D.D27_SHORT: Station Metrological Parameters must conform to the standard "Climate and Forecast Standard" Subset of GRIB or the Meteo parameter list eionet data dictionary
D.D28: The content of aqd:AQD_Station/aqd:areaClassification shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/areaclassification/
D.D28_SHORT: Must conform to a recognised Station Classification from the eionet data dictionary. These are: Rural, Rural-Nearcity, Rural-Regional, Rural-Remote, Suburban, Urban
D.D29: The content of aqd:AQD_Station/aqd:dispersionLocal shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/dispersionlocal/
D.D29_SHORT: Must use a recognised Local descriptpor from the eionet data dictionary. These are: Canyon, Detached, Elevated and Open.
D.D30: The content of aqd:AQD_Station/aqd:dispersionRegional shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/dispersionregional/
D.D30_SHORT: Must use a recognised Regional descriptor: Alpine, Base, Basin-Hilly, Coast-Mount, Coast-Plane, Hilly, Mount, Mount-Slope, Plane, Valley-Hilly and Valley-Mount.
D.D31_SHORT: Sampling Point local Id are not unique codes:
D.D32: Count the number of unique AQD_SamplingPoint (via localId) submitted within base:namespace
D.D32_SHORT: The number of unique Sampling Points submitted within the XML document.
D.D33: The content of aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/ef:mediaMonitored shall resolve to any concept inhttp://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/inspire/MediaValue/
D.D33_SHORT: Must conform to the code 'air' in the Media codelist in the Inspire registry
D.D34: aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/am:geometry/gml:Point the srsName attribute shall be a recognisable URN . The following 2 srsNames are expected urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4258 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326
D.D34_SHORT: The coordinate reference system for the zones must be defined with a correct uniform resource name and must either be ETRS 1989, ETRS89/ETRS-LAEA or WGS 84
D.D35: ./ef:geometry/gml:Point/gml:pos the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to "2" to allow the coordinate of the station
D.D35_SHORT: The Dimension attribute shall resolve to "2"
D.D36: ./ef:geometry/gml:Point/gml:pos shall resolve to within the approximate geographic location of the AQD_Station cited by .aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint ef:broader
D.D36_SHORT: The sampling point location shall resolve within the approximate location of the AQD_Station
D.D37: Total number aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/ef:observingCapability/ef:ObservingCapability/ef:observingTime/gml:TimePeriod/ invalid or overlapping operational activity periods
D.D37_SHORT: Invalid or overlapping operational activity periods
D.D40: The content of ../ef:observedProperty shall resolve to a valid code withinhttp://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/
D.D40_SHORT: Must be a registered pollutant under
D.D41: Cross-check with AQD_Sample (./ef:observingCapability/ef:ObservingCapability/ef:featureOfInterest/@xlink shall resolve to a traversable local of global URI to an ../AQD_Sample)
D.D41_SHORT: Sample shall resolve to a traversable local of global URL.
D.D42: Cross-check with AQD_SamplingPointProcess (./ef:observingCapability/ef:ObservingCapability/ef:procedure/@xlink shall resolve to a traversable local of global URI to ../AQD_SamplingPointProcess)
D.D42_SHORT: Sampling Point Process shall resolve to a traversable local of the global URL.
D.D43: Cross-check with AQD_Station (../ef:broader/@xlink shall resolve to a traversable local of global URI to ../AQD_Station)
D.D43_SHORT: Station shall resolve to a traversable local of the global URL.
D.D44: Cross-check with AQD_Network (aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/ef:belongsTo shall resolve to a traversable local of global URI to ../AQD_Network)
D.D44_SHORT: Network shall resolve to a traversable local of global URL.
D.D44b: bb Cross-check with AQD_Network (aqd:AQD_Station/ef:belongsTo shall resolve to a traversable local of global URI to ../AQD_Network)
D.D44b_SHORT: Network shall resolve to a traversable local of global URL.
D.D45: Total number aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/ef:operationActivityPeriod/ef:OperationActivityPeriod/ef:activityTime/gml:TimePeriod/ invalid operational activity periods
D.D45_SHORT: Total number of invalid operational activity periods:
D.D46: Total number of AQD_SamplingPoints which are operational
D.D50: Total number/aqd:stationClassification which resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/stationclassification/ via xlink:href
D.D50_SHORT: Number of Station Classifications conforming to: Background, Industrial and Traffic
D.D51_SHORT: Number of invalid 3 elements in Sampling Point and Environmental Objective combinations:
D.D52: Number of SamplingPoint(s) declared as usedAQD = TRUE which are not used in any Assessment Regime stored in Content Registry
D.D52_SHORT: Number of SamplingPoint(s) registered that are not used in any Assessment Regime stored in Content Registry
D.D54_SHORT: Local Id for Sampling Point not unique codes:
D.D55: Count the number of unique AQD_SamplingPointProcess (via localId) submitted within base:namespace
D.D55_SHORT: The number of unique Sampling Point Processes
D.D56_SHORT: Must conform to a regognised Measurement Type from the eionet data dictionary. These are: Active, Automatic, Passive, Remote and Unknown.
D.D57: If ./aqd:measurementType resolves to ./measurementtype/automatic or ./measurementtype/remote, aqd:measurementMethod shall be included and resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/measurementmethod/ AND /aqd:samplingMethod and ./aqd:analyticalTechnique SHALL NOT BE PROVIDED
D.D57_SHORT: If Measurement Type is Automatic or Remote and conforms to any of the 31 recognised measurement methods in the eionet data dictionary, then Sampling Method and Technique shall not be provided.
D.D59: The content of /aqd:AQD_SamplingPointProcess/aqd:analyticalTechnique shall resolve to any concept inhttp://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/analyticaltechnique/
D.D59_SHORT: Analytcical Technique must use any of the 42 analytcical technique recognised methods in the eionet data dictionary.
D.D60a: The content of ./aqd:AQD_SamplingPointProcess/aqd:measurementType shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/measurementequipment/
D.D60a_SHORT: Sampling Process and Measurement Type must use any of the measurement equipment in the eionet data dictionary.
D.D60b: The content of ./aqd:AQD_SamplingPointProcess/aqd:samplingEquipment shall resolve to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/samplingequipment/
D.D60b_SHORT: Sampling Process and Equipment must use any of the sampling equipment in the eionet data dictionary.
D.D63: Where ./aqd:detectionLimit is resolved uom link resolving to any concept in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/concentration/ shall be provided
D.D63_SHORT: If Detection Limit is specified, then a link to a concentration value from the eionet data dictionary must be provided.
D.D67: SamplingPointProcess(es) with incorrect code for Equivalence demonstration (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/equivalencedemonstrated/)
D.D67_SHORT: Sampling Process was reported with incorrect code for Equivalence demonstration.
D.D68: SamplingPointProcess(es) declared as an equivalent method” i.e. http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/equivalencedemonstrated/yes but /aqd:demonstrationReport not provided.
D.D68_SHORT: Sampling Process was declared as an equivalent method but the Demonstration Report was not provided.
D.D69: SamplingPointProcess(es) is missing mandatory document on Traceability and Uncertainty Estimation via aqd:AQD_SamplingPointProcess/aqd:dataQuality/aqd:DataQuality/aqd:documentation.
D.D69_SHORT: Sampling Process is missing mandatory document on Traceability and Uncertainty Estimation.
D.D70: SamplingPointProcess(es) is missing mandatory document on QA/QC via aqd:AQD_SamplingPointProcess/aqd:dataQuality/aqd:DataQuality/aqd:qaReport.
D.D70_SHORT: Sampling Process is missing mandatory document on QA/QC.
D.D72: Count the number of unique AQD_Sample (via localId) submitted within base:namespace
D.D72_SHORT: The number of unique Samples in the XML Document.
D.D73: ./sams:shape/gml:Point the srsName attribute shall be a recognisable URN . The following 2 srsNames are expected urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4258 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326
D.D73_SHORT: The coordinate reference system for the zones must be defined with a correct uniform resource name and must either be ETRS 1989, ETRS89/ETRS-LAEA or WGS 84
D.D74: ./sams:shape/gml:Point, the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to “2” to allow the coordinate of the feature of interest
D.D78: ./aqd:inletHeight shall contain a numerical value, uom within it shall resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/length/m
D.D78_SHORT: Inlet Height must be in meters.

C.C1: Total number of AQ Assessment Regime feature types
C.C1_SHORT: Total number of feature types is
C.C4: All gml:id attributes shall have unique content within the document or namespace
C.C4_SHORT: All Id attributes must have unique content within the XML document
C.C5: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code for the assessment regime.
C.C5_SHORT: Local Id shall be unique for the assessment regime.
C.C6: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
C.C7: Each of the number of /aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime records shall contain 1 ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmental Objective records per /aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime element
C.C7_SHORT: Each Assessment Regime shall have one Environmental Objective element
C.C8: Assessment regimes reported for all expected pollutants
C.C8_SHORT: Assessment regimes reported for all expected pollutants
C.C9: Assessment regime(s) not found for the following pollutant(s):
C.C9_SHORT: For the following pollutants there are missing assessment regimes:
C.C10:
Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 the 3 elements within ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/may only resolve to the following combinations Hide combinations aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/hrsAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
or
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/daysAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
or
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/CL aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/aMean aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
or
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/CL aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/wMean aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
or
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/ALT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/3hAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
C.C10_SHORT:
When the pollutant is SO2 then the environmental objective should include one of the following combinations:
The number of hours in exceedence in a calendar year is above the Limit Value for Health. or The number of days in exceedence in a calendar year is above the Limit Value for Health. or The Crtical Level for Vegetation is above the average. or The Alert Threshold for Health is over 3 hours in exceedence.
C.C11:
Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 the 3 elements within ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/may only resolve to the following combinations Hide combinations aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/TV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/daysAbove-3yr aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
or

C.C11_SHORT: When the pollutant is O3 then the environmental objective should include one of the following combinations: The Target Value for Health is the Days in exceedance averaged over 3 calendar years. Or The Long Term Objective for Health is the Days in exceedance in a calendar year Or The Target Value for Vegatation is averaged over 5 years. Or AOT40c applies to the Long Term Objective for Vegetation. Or Exceeds the Information Threshhold for Health for the calendar year. Or Exceeds the Alert Threshold for Health in a calendar year.

C.C20: Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 and ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LTO ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:exceedanceAttainment xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/aboveLTO http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/belowLTO
C.C20_SHORT: Where the pollutant is ozone and objective type is Long term objective (LTO) then the the observed pollution levels (exceedanceAttainment) shall either be: - Above the long-term objective - Below the long-term objective
C.C21: ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:exceedanceAttainment xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/aboveUAT http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/belowLAT http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/LAT-UAT where http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/ that must be one of Hide items http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/9 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/10 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/6001 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5014 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5018 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5015 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5029 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5012 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/20
C.C21_SHORT: IF the Assessment Threshold is Above the Upper Assessment Threshold, or Below the Lower Assessment Threshold, or Between the upper and lower threshold (LAT-UAT), on 3 or more occasions during the 5 previous years, then there must be an AQ Pollutant from the following list. SO3, NO2, NOX, CO, PM10, PM2.5, Cd in PM10, As in PM10, Ni in PM10, BaP in PM10, Pb in PM10, C6H6
C.C22: Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to the list in C9 ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:exceedanceAttainment xlink:href attribute shall resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmentthresholdexceedance/NA
C.C22_SHORT: If pollutant belongs to the list of missing pollutants from C9, then the assessment threshold is not applicable.
C.C23: ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype/[concept]Current options in the codelist are:http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype/fixed http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype/model http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype/indicative http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype/objective
C.C23_SHORT: The assessement type shall be either "Fixed Measurement," "modelling," "Indicative Measurement"or "Objective Estiamtion."

C.C25: This check is performed under “Check xlink references”
C.C25_SHORT: This check is performed under “Check xlink references”
C.C26: The assessment methods referenced by ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:modelAssessmentMeta data or ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPointAssessmentMetadata xlink:href attribute shall contain one element /aqd:AQD_Model/ef:observingCapability/ef:ObservingCapability/ef:observingTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition or /aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/ef:observingCapability/ef:ObservingCapability/ef:observingTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition that is operational within the aqd:reportingPeriod included in the ReportingHead
C.C26_SHORT: End Time for the Assessment period must be within the Reporting Period
C.C27: The number of unique zones cited by /aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime (7) shall be EQUAL to the number of unique zones in ./aqd:AQD_Zone
C.C27_SHORT: The number of zones must be the same as cited in the AssessmentRegime
C.C28: The lifecycle information of ./aqd:zone xlink:href shall be current, /aqd:AQD_Zone/am:beginLifespanVersion AND /aqd:AQD_Zone/am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition shall be operational within the aqd:reportingPeriod included in the ReportingHead
C.C28_SHORT: Start and End time shall be within the Reporting Period
C.C29: aqd:zone xlink:href attribute shall resolve to a traversable link to an AQ zone in /aqd:AQD_Zone reported under cdr.eionet.europa.eu/ZZ/eu/aqd/b/... The ./aqd:pollutant and ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/aqd:protectionTarget within the Assessment Regime shall equal one combination /aqd:AQD_Zone/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode and /aqd:AQD_Zone/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget within the linked zone aqd:AQD_Zone/aqd:pollutantsException : Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/6001 ./aqd:zone xlink:href attribute MAY resolve to <aqd:zone nilReason='inapplicable'/>
C.C29_SHORT: Pollutant, Assessment Threshold and Environmental Objective shall equal one combination, except where where Particulate Matter < 2.5 µm, which is not applicable.
C.C32: ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentType shall be compared with the /aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/aqd:assessmentType for assessment method cited by ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPoint Assessm entMetadata xlink:href attribute and/ or /aqd:AQD_Model /aqd:assessmentType for assessment method cited by ./aqd:assessmentMet hods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPoint Assessm entMetadata xlink:href attribute
C.C33: If The lifecycle information of ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:*AssessmentMetadata xlink:href shall be current, then /AQD_SamplingPoint/aqd:operationActivityPeriod/gml:endPosition or /AQD_ModelType/aqd:operationActivityPeriod/gml:endPosition shall be equal to “9999-12-31 23:59:59Z” or nulled (blank)
C.C33_SHORT: If the Asseement Metadata lifecycle information is current, then the Operational Activity End Time is equal to 9999-12-31 23:59:59Z or nulled (blank)
C.C35: /aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/aqd:usedAQD or /aqd:AQD_ModelType/aqd:used shall EQUAL “true” for all ./aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:*AssessmentMetadata xlink:href citations
C.C37: There shall be only 1 record per MS where ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmental Objective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/AEI
C.C37_SHORT: Where the assessment threshold is Average Exposure Indicator, there can be only 1 record.
C.C38: Where./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/AEI the /aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint/aqd:relevantEmissions/aqd:RelevantEmissions/aqd:stationClassification xlink:href attribute shall resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/stationclassification/background for all aqd:AQD_SamplingPoint linked via aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime/aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods /aqd:samplingPointAssessmentMetadata citations
C.C38_SHORT: Where the Station classification is Background, the Average Exposure Indicator for the assessment threshold and Environmental Objective is provided by citations.
C.C40: The total number of /aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPointAssessmentMetadata and /aqd:assessmentMethods/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:modelAssessmentMetadata citations within a MS (delivery) shall be GREATER THAN OR EQUAL to 1 where ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute resolves to
C.C40_SHORT: Within a delivery, the number of Assessment Metadata citations must be equal to, or greater, than the number of pollutants.
